snippet: Ted Cruz won a Republican runoff election after more than a year of street campaigning, and his victory is all but assured in November.
abstract: Man in the News profile of Rafael Edward Cruz, Tea Party-backed candidate who defeated Lt Gov David Dewhurst in a Republican runoff election for the open Senate seat in Texas; Cruz's victory is all but assured, and marks a rightward shift in the Texas Republican party.
lead_paragraph: Ted Cruz won a Republican runoff election after more than a year of street campaigning, and his victory is all but assured in November.

headline.seo: Ted Cruz Poised to Be Senate’s Tea Party Intellectual
headline.main: A Republican Voice With Tea Party Mantle and Intellectual Heft
headline.print_headline: A Republican Voice With Tea Party Mantle And Intellectual Heft
headline.content_kicker: Man in the News| Rafael Edward Cruz
